# showsHelp()

**Instance Method**

Indicates whether the help button is currently set to be displayed.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func showsHelp() -> Bool
```

## Discussion

This method returns [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the help button is currently set to be displayed.

## Providing Help

- **setHelpAnchor(_:)**: Sets the help anchor string for the sheet or modal panel.
- **setShowsHelp(_:)**: Displays a Help button in the sheet or panel.
- **helpAnchor()**: Returns the current help anchor string for the sheet or panel.
